name: Zpanelx-installers
body: zpanelx-installers ================== ZpanelX installers for Ubuntu and CentOS Supported OS's: Ubuntu, 14.04 So far CentOS, N/A Yet Installers: Ubuntu 14.04: ```bash <(curl -Ss https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eoghan2t9/zpanelx-installers/master/ubuntu-14.04-LTS-apache2.4.9-php5.5.14.sh)``` Features: Varnish 3.0.5 XCache v4.0.0-dev Apache 2.4.10 PHP 5.5.19 Bug Fixes:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
